page.title: 11Life Style on Beeley Moor
page.content: Within the farming families, the wives take an active part in the running of the farm in addition to caring for the home and the family needs. During harvest time and lambing all the family help with the work encouraging a close knit family unit. All have 6 miles to travel to comprehensive shpping centres and the children are taken to school by special buses. In the winter it is necessary to stock up with supplies and food for both the family and livestock. Well stocked kitchen gardens provide vegetables and soft fruit, the surplus being preserved by bottling or freezing. {AMMENITIES:-}all have the telephone. All have electricity, but one. This uses bottled gas for cooking and parafin for light. Spring water is piped and sanitation depends on cesspits or septic tanks.
